page.title: 12A day in my life
page.content: The juniors recommence work at 1 o clock whereas the infants are lucky because they have until 1.30p.m. to play. The afternoon begins with P.E. We get changed into our kit and then go outside for a game of rounders,cricket or athletics.In the winter we play football or netball.When the game has finished we go inside and get changed into our uniform again.Afterwards we read or do some other work until playtime at 2.20p.m.It is just like morning break in as much as we don't get much time and it goes very quickly.During the last part of the day we complete any work that we have not finished until school ends at 3.30p.m. At 3.30p.m. we grab our coats and bags and run out of school,glad that another day is over.
